column4: Hi, question... I tried to switch to ubuntu, have to say I like it a lot. One important problem though, could't get connected to my wireless network (WPA). I found it's possible to filter MAC addresses for the network via my router, does this provide enough security? Or is it only secure using signal encription?
Ok so it won't make it secure..
the WPA makes it secure, but the MAC filter stops people from freely connecting to your router to use your internet
